attributes.action: abolish prescription charges in England for people in receipt of Incapacity benefit, ESA(C),JSA (C) and DLA care and mobility components (whatever the rate)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please abolish all prescription fees for all people in receipt on non means tested benefits, but which a health implication. I.e. ESA(C),Incapacity benefit, DLA (any component and rate)and credits only cases.People who receive these benefits may be getting as little as £60.50 p.w.for ongoing prescriptions.
